duties_responsibilities.duty: Create integrated project plans for contract deliverables and new products in development projects.
Manage a project team and review, manage, and control project status and budgets.
Assess project issues and develop resolutions to meet productivity, quality, and client-satisfaction goals.
Manage Jira epics and product backlog, plan sprint cycles, and ensure timely delivery.
Develop various project deliverables in support of the Product Line and assist in reviews of researcher requests.
Manage team-wide communications and provide status report updates to VA Leadership and Business Owners.
Supervise professional and technical support personnel, schedule tasks, and coordinate with various team members.
Manage the direction of a project through design, implementation, and testing in accordance with project objectives.
Define requirements, plans project lifecycle deployment, and integrate vendor tasks and track deliverables.
Ensure adherence to quality standards, conduct project meetings, and track project progress and reporting.
Identify and manage risks, issues, and blockers impacting the progress and outcome of the sub-product line.
Serve as a Scrum Master on an as-needed basis, develop and maintain scheduled project sprints and backlog.
Support fast turnaround requests for data, understand the ask and request data from the appropriate team member.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s Degree in Engineering, Computer Science, Systems, Business or related technical discipline (Master's preferred)
